field.name: RXNEIE
field.description: RX buffer not empty interrupt enable

field.name: CHLEN
field.description: Channel length (number of bits per audio channel)

field.name: CPSMEN
field.description: Command path state machine (CPSM) Enable bit

field.name: WAITPEND
field.description: CPSM Waits for ends of data transfer (CmdPend internal signal).

field.name: DTMODE
field.description: Data transfer mode selection 1: Stream or SDIO multibyte data transfer.

field.name: CEATAEND
field.description: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61

field.name: RXFIFOHF
field.description: Receive FIFO half full: there are at least 8 words in the FIFO

field.name: TXFIFOHE
field.description: Transmit FIFO half empty: at least 8 words can be written into the FIFO

field.name: STBITERR
field.description: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode

field.name: DATAEND
field.description: Data end (data counter, SDIDCOUNT, is zero)

field.name: CEATAENDIE
field.description: CE-ATA command completion signal received interrupt enable

field.name: SDIOITIE
field.description: SDIO mode interrupt received interrupt enable

field.name: RXDAVLIE
field.description: Data available in Rx FIFO interrupt enable

field.name: TXDAVLIE
field.description: Data available in Tx FIFO interrupt enable

field.name: RXFIFOHFIE
field.description: Rx FIFO half full interrupt enable

field.name: TXFIFOHEIE
field.description: Tx FIFO half empty interrupt enable

field.name: RXOVERRIE
field.description: Rx FIFO overrun error interrupt enable

field.name: TXUNDERRIE
field.description: Tx FIFO underrun error interrupt enable

field.name: FIFOCOUNT
field.description: Remaining number of words to be written to or read from the FIFO.

field.name: AWDEN
field.description: Analog watchdog enable on regular channels

field.name: JAWDEN
field.description: Analog watchdog enable on injected channels

field.name: AWDSGL
field.description: Enable the watchdog on a single channel in scan mode

field.name: EXTEN
field.description: External trigger enable for regular channels

field.name: EXTSEL
field.description: External event select for regular group

field.name: JEXTEN
field.description: External trigger enable for injected channels

field.name: JEXTSEL
field.description: External event select for injected group

field.name: DDS
field.description: DMA disable selection (for single ADC mode)

field.name: DMA
field.description: Direct memory access mode (for single ADC mode)
